data.name: Hero_Description
data.value: .NET Cameroon is a group of passionate .NET enthusiasts based in Cameroon, committed to promoting Microsoft technologies and fostering interest in the local community.

data.name: WhatWeDo_Description
data.value: At .NET Cameroon Community, we're all about innovation, learning, and collaboration. Join us to sharpen your skills, connect with fellow developers, and make an impact through our dynamic activities.

data.name: Activity_LiveCoding_Description
data.value: Join our live coding sessions to collaborate, learn, and solve coding challenges in real-time.

data.name: Activity_Conferences_Description
data.value: Connect with fellow developers through insightful talks, workshops, and networking opportunities.

data.name: Activity_OpenSource_Description
data.value: Contribute to impactful open source projects and collaborate with developers to make a difference.

data.name: Membership_Description
data.value: The .NET ecosystem is rapidly evolving, bringing cutting-edge innovations and exciting opportunities for developers. By joining our community, you'll be at the forefront of these changes, connecting with fellow enthusiasts who share your passion for .NET.

data.name: Membership_Stats_Followers
data.value: Followers on our social media platforms

data.name: Membership_Stats_Projects
data.value: Active Open source projects and libraries

data.name: Sponsors_Description
data.value: We work with various companies, startups and communities

data.name: Projects_Description
data.value: Explore the innovative open-source projects driving our community forward. Built with passion and collaboration, these projects reflect our commitment to sharing knowledge and building impactful solutions together.

data.name: Meta_Description
data.value: Welcome to the .NET Cameroon Community website! Join us to learn, share, and collaborate on .NET technologies. Stay updated with our latest events, resources, and news.

data.name: NetConf_MetaDescription
data.value: .NET Conf Cameroon is a premier event for developers, tech enthusiasts, and industry leaders to explore the latest in .NET, connect with the community, and drive innovation in software development. Join us for inspiring talks, hands-on sessions, and networking opportunities!

data.name: NetConf_GetReady
data.value: Get ready to expand your skills, meet fellow developers, and dive into the latest trends in .NET at this year's event! Here's what awaits you

data.name: NetConf_EventDescription
data.value: Get ready to join developers, tech enthusiasts, and industry experts from across Cameroon and beyond for an exciting day dedicated to .NET innovation. Whether you're an experienced developer or just starting your journey, this conference offers something for everyone.

data.name: NetConf_WhyAttendDescription
data.value: Whether you're an experienced developer or a newcomer to .NET, this event offers a valuable opportunity to grow, learn, and connect

data.name: NetConf_StayAhead
data.value: Stay Ahead with the Latest in .NET 9

data.name: NetConf_ShareExpertise
data.value: Share Your Expertise at .NET Conf Cameroon!

data.name: NetConf_SpeakerDescription
data.value: Are you passionate about .NET, cutting-edge technologies, or building innovative solutions? Do you enjoy sharing your knowledge and inspiring others to grow? Then we want YOU to be part of .NET Conf Cameroon 2024!

data.name: NetConf_AgendaTitle
data.value: Take a look at our Agenda

data.name: NetConf_AgendaDescription
data.value: Discover the lineup of engaging sessions and activities we have planned for .NET Conf! Dive into the day's agenda and join us for an inspiring journey through .NET innovation and community connections

data.name: NetConf_SponsorsTitle
data.value: Meet our amazing Sponsors and Partners

data.name: NetConf_SponsorsDescription
data.value: Our sponsors and partners power .NET Conf Cameroon, fostering innovation and growth in our tech community. Join us to showcase your brand and make a lasting impact!

data.name: NetConf_LastYearSubtitle
data.value: A brief overview of the Infinite Days last year

data.name: NetConf_LastYearDescription
data.value: Last year, we hosted the Infinite Days event sponsored by Infinite Solutions SARL, a tech company building enterprise level softwares and solutions. Here is a small recap by pictures of this amazing event !!

data.name: Session_PowerBI_Title
data.value: Microsoft Power BI - Introduction to Power BI: Data Exploration and Interactive Dashboard Creation

data.name: Footer_JoinDescription
data.value: Join us on our different platforms

data.name: Session_DeployAspire_Title
data.value: Deploy .NET Aspire app to Kubernetes using Azure DevOps pipelines

data.name: Session_DDDClient_Title
data.value: Domain-Driven Design from the Client Perspective

data.name: Session_MAUIParse_Title
data.value: Cross-Platform Development Simplified: Building a Sync-Enabled To-Do App with .NET MAUI and Parse

data.name: Session_PythonDotNetHybrid_Title
data.value: Develop a modern web application with Python and .NET: A hybrid approach for web developers
